name: Hyper Kremlin Bros. II Tournament Edition
name_original: Hyper Kremlin Bros. II Tournament Edition
description:
Putin has lost the last one of his marbles.

The only thing that can save Russia is indiscriminate useof nuclear weapons.

The Kremlin's corridors seem to shift around him as the
demented dictator rabidly rushes towards his nuclear bunker.

How long can you delay the inevitable?
